meanings.sent1: The possessor of the shiny new bike was very happy.
meanings.sent2: The possessor of the golden key unlocked the mysterious door.
meanings.sent3: The possessor of the magic wand waved it and turned the frog into a prince.
meanings.sent4: As the possessor of the crown, she ruled over the kingdom with grace.
meanings.sent5: The possessor of the treasure map set off on an exciting adventure to find the hidden gold.

meanings.definition: A person who owns or has control over something.
meanings.sent1: The proud possessor of the rare coin showed it to everyone.
meanings.sent2: The wise possessor of knowledge shared it with others.
meanings.sent3: The lucky possessor of the winning ticket jumped for joy.
meanings.sent4: The rightful possessor of the family heirloom cherished it dearly.
meanings.sent5: The generous possessor of the magical ring used its powers for good deeds.
